name: The Buffet
description:
Elevated Pet Feeders with optional engraving and wood stain.

The Buffet is our premier feeding station for fido. Reclaimed wine crates are put back into use as your pup's new elevated feeder. Typically made from pine and including two removable dishwasher and food-safe stainless steel 2-quart bowls, this feeding station helps to give better eating posture for your pet's spine during chow time. Not to mention they are not your typical plastic eyesore on the floor.

Custom personalization is available with your pet's name and birthdate as vintage date on the front facing long panel or the one blank short panel at no extra charge. Small phrases are welcomed as well. There is no setup fee or per character fee. All engraving and customization is included along with choice of wood stain finish. Typically, exact wine crate, height and bowls are selected for your unique little wolf. (Please specify at time of ordering your dog's breed, age and general size.)

name: The Vault
description:
Toy storage crate with optional engraving and wood stain.

The Vault is your answer for storage in a stylish addition to your living room for keeping all of fido's toys in order. Reclaimed wine crates are put back into use as your pup's new toy bin. Typically made from pine, these bins are modified with Manila rope handles both functional and stylish old charm.

Custom personalization is available with your pet's name and birthdate as a vintage date on the front facing long panel or the one blank short panel at no extra charge. Small phrases are welcomed as well. There is no setup fee or per character fee. All engraving and customization is included along with choice of wood stain finish.

name: The Lounge
description:
Reclaimed Wine Crate Pet Lounge with optional engraving and wood stain.

The Lounge is the perfect size for your little wolf or new pup. Reclaimed wine crates are put back into use as your fido's new bed and place to hide treats. Typically made from pine, these bins are modified with one panel hand cut to let fido easily step in and out and onto a comfy bed.

Custom personalization is available with your pet's name and birthdate as vintage date on the front facing long panel or the one blank short panel at no extra charge. Small phrases are welcomed as well. There is no setup fee or per character fee. All engraving and customization is included along with choice of wood stain finish.

name: The Quickdraw
description: Reclaimed climbing rope and tennis ball toy for throwing and tugging with fido.
